column5: Vintage Craftsman home in beautiful TCU neighborhood, conveniently located one block north of campus. House has full kitchen, 2 bedrooms plus study with Wireless printer, living room with smart TV, off-street parking and a front porch with swing. Very comfortable for a weekend stay, a week or a month. One mile from zoo, University Village shopping, 2 miles from museums, Will Rogers Equestrian Center, 2.5 miles from Magnolia restaurants and shops.
